aquarium.creatures

Class ImageCreature

  • java.lang.Object
    • aquarium.creatures.ImageCreature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Creature
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineSwimmer

    public abstract class ImageCreature
extends java.lang.Object
implements Creature
    A Creature which can be given the name of a file residing in "aquarium\images" and will use that image file as the appearance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageCreature(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates an ImageCreature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getAppearance()
      Gets the image that can be used to render this Creature's appearance.
      java.awt.Point getLocation()
      Gets the location of the center point of this Creature.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the friendly name of this Creature.
      abstract void hitClouds()
      Event method called by the Aquarium to indicate that the Creature has touched or passed the top of the sky area.
      abstract void hitFloor()
      Event method called by the Aquarium to indicate that the Creature has touched or passed the floor (bottom).
      abstract void hitLeftWall()
      Event method called by the Aquarium to indicate that the Creature has touched or passed the left wall.
      abstract void hitRightWall()
      Event method called by the Aquarium to indicate that the Creature has touched or passed the right wall.
      abstract void hitSurface()
      Event method called by the Aquarium to indicate that the Creature is touching the water's surface.
      abstract void updateLocation()
      Causes the Creature to move in some way.

        public ImageCreature(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String fileName)
        Creates an ImageCreature.
        Parameters:
        name - The friendly name of the ImageCreature
        fileName - The name of the image for this ImageCreature (e.g., "image.jpg")
